text: here 's more on that theft of the cash machine in ashby-de-la-zouch this morning

det con miranda granger , from leicestershire police , said : the digger was used to ram the front of the building in order for the suspects to remove the cash machine which would have caused a significant amount of disruption .
our investigation is continuing and we 're keen to hear from anyone with information about the incident .
did you see any sus activity in the area ?
do you know anything about the incident ? ''
author: Ben Truslove
BBC News Online

documents.title: lorry driver jailed for texting-at-the-wheel crash
text: here 's the shocking moment a lorry ploughed into the back of a tractor on the a38 in derbyshire while texting at the wheel
michael morton , 45 , was jailed at nottingham crown court today for two years and four months , derbyshire police said .
he had been driving one-handed while using his smartphone and travelling at a speed of about 50mph when he failed to see a tractor in the same lane .
morton 's vehicle smashed into the rear of the tractor coming to a stop on the central reservation .
the 58-year-old tractor driver was thrown from his cab suffering six broken ribs , spinal fractures and a lacerated scalp .
morton , from , shirebrook , admitted causing serious injury by dangerous driving and was also banned from driving for four years and four months .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: two suspects wanted by police after stabbing
text: police are looking to get in touch with two men after a man was stabbed in the leg in bestwood park at about 19:45 on saturday night .
a 37-year-old man was taken to queen 's medical centre , nottinghamshire police said , but was later discharged .
both men sought by police are said to be white , stocky and aged between 35 and 45 .
author: Liam Barnes
BBC News Online

documents.title: leicester city : swansea reject £ 40m offer for sigurdsson
text: the foxes could have to shell out £ 50m if they 're to land icelandic midfielder gylfi sigurdsson this summer .
swansea city have rejected a bid of £ 40m from leicester for one of their star players .
everton are also said to be keen on extending their summer spending by splashing out on the 27-year-old , so craig shakespeare 's side could have a fight on their hands .
author: BBC Sport Wales

documents.title: man dies after 'serious assault ' in hyson green
text: a 40-year-old man has died after what police have described as a `` serious assault '' in hyson green .
nottinghamshire police said they were called to pleasant row at about 06:00 on sunday after a man suffered a serious head injury after arguing with another man .
he was taken to queen 's medical centre but later died from his injuries .
a spokesman for the force said they 're asking anyone with information to come forward .
author: Liam Barnes
BBC News Online

text: we 've received a bit more information about the crash on the a50 .
it happened on the eastbound side between junctions 3 and 2 , near chellaston , just before 15:00 .
the westbound carriageway has been closed for the air ambulance to land .
a derbyshire police spokeswoman said : `` please avoid the area as we expect this stretch of the a50 to be closed for some time . ''

documents.title: man jailed for historical sex assault
text: a man has been jailed for a year after being found guilty of indecently assaulting a child under 13 in the 1990s .
paul brough , 55 , of arkwright in derbyshire , was sentenced at derby crown court on thursday for the attack which happened in chesterfield , .
an investigation was launched in 2015 when the victim felt confident enough to come forward and make a report to officers , derbyshire police said .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man charged after village firearms raid
text: a man has been charged with firearms offences after a house was raided in radcliffe-on-trent , nottinghamshire , on saturday .
four people were arrested at the property in shelford road .
three have been released under investigation while a 25-year-old man has been charged with two offences of possession of a firearm and ammunition .
he was due to appear at nottingham magistrates ' court this afternoon .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: £ 20k of watches stolen in nottinghamshire
text: four watches worth a total of over £ 20,000 have been stolen from a property in woodthorpe , police said .
the burglary happened in albemarle road , woodthorpe at about 12:00 on thursday .
the following men 's watches were stolen :

BBC Local Live

documents.title: wimbledon : clarke and willis knocked out in last 16
text: there were high hopes for derby 's teenage tennis star jay clarke as he headed out today for his doubles match with partner marcus willis .
sadly for fans of the 18-year-old , the british duo were knocked out of this year 's wimbledon tournament by oliver marach and mate pavic .

he 'll have high hopes of returning in the future , but for now let 's look back at the happier times , and saturday 's sensational success against reigning champions pierre-hugues herbert and nicolas mahut .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: missing girl found
text: tia lilly lindo , 13 , who was reported missing from eastwood last night has been found , nottinghamshire police said .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: rugby : celtic opponents for nottingham
text: nottingham rugby will be facing sides from england , ireland and wales in this year 's british and irish cup .
they were drawn in pool 1 for this year 's competition , and will play current holders bedford blues , ospreys premiership select and current holders munster a .
ian costello 's side will start their campaign at home to bedford on 15 october before finishing their pool matches away to the same opponents on 20 january next year .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: county ins & outs 2017
text: county ins & outs 2017

documents.title: computer fault causes travel chaos for east midlands airport passengers
text: passengers at east midlands airport ( ema ) faced hours of delays on sunday after a plane was forced to return because of computer issues .
a thomas cook flight , from ema to larnaca , cyprus , took off at 13:50 yesterday afternoon but ended up returning because of `` a discrepancy with an onboard computer system . ''
`` this was investigated and the aircraft took off four hours later , '' a spokesperson for thomas cook said .
meanwhile , with the larnaca flight returning to ema , it caused a ryanair flight that was coming in from malaga to divert to birmingham .
a ryanair spokesperson said : `` the runway at east midlands was temporarily closed due to an emergency landing involving another airline .
`` the aircraft landed normally in birmingham , before departing to east midlands when the runway reopened . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: mysterious hacker targets mansfield radio station
text: nobody tends to bat an eyelid when a novelty song from the past comes on the radio , but listeners to mansfield 103.2 have been plagued by the repeated return of a rather blue ditty from the 1970s .

a hijacker took to the airwaves , playing the winker 's song ( misprint ) by the infamous ivor biggun , with managing director tony delahunty saying it 's popped up about eight times in the last month .
it made its latest showing on a live sunday afternoon broadcast .
a local listener is believed to be behind the prank , and bosses at the station now have their hands full trying to work out how to stop the hack coming back .
some people have told me that their children have started humming the song in the car .

we have had calls from people who have found it hilarious , while some have raised their concerns , including our competitors , and a lot of people in the industry are aghast at how difficult it is to stop these people . ''
author: Liam Barnes
BBC News Online

documents.title: prisoner absconds from hmp sudbury
text: police are hunting for a missing convict after he absconded from an open prison in derbyshire last night .
jamie recardo , who was sentenced to nine years for conspiracy to commit robbery in 2015 , left hmp sudbury on sunday .
the 27-year-old , whose home address is in luton , has not been seen since .
author: Liam Barnes
BBC News Online

documents.title: have you seen missing tia ?
text: police are concerned for the safety of a 13-year-old girl who 's gone missing from eastwood in nottinghamshire .
tia lilly lindo was reported missing at about 21:30 last night .
she may have connections in the south yorkshire and derbyshire areas , nottinghamshire police said .

documents.title: backpacker 's mum wants to make a difference
text: rosie ayliffe , whose daughter mia was stabbed to death in an australian hostel last year , is trying to make something meaningful come from her senseless death .

she 's aiming to improve working conditions for backpackers in australia and started a campaign in the months following mia 's death , calling on the australian government to introduce basic standards and a duty of care in the industry .
although she accepts there are `` wonderful employers '' as well as bad ones , rosie said she does n't think `` people back home would be happy about the abuse '' some backpackers have encountered .
during her trip to retrace her daughter 's footsteps , rosie 's belief that backpackers are being exploited was reinforced by stories she heard from young people .
lauren , from liverpool , who did part of her required 88 days of work in a factory packing oranges , said : `` basically , it 's slave labour .
you 're on your feet 12 hours a day , with 20-minute breaks in the morning and lunchtime . ''
the australian government said it recognises migrant workers , including backpackers , are vulnerable to exploitation and has set up a taskforce .

prime minister malcolm turnbull wrote to rosie last year to express his sympathy and to confirm extra funding for the fair work ombudsman and `` higher penalties '' for those who exploit migrant workers .
rosie , who plans to carry on campaigning in australia , said : `` i have got to get the story out there .
i have done my best to do something to stop what 's happening here . ''
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: northern rail strikes affect notts-lincs services
text: there 'll be rail replacement buses on some northern rail services from retford to lincoln and gainsborough as a result of the three-day strike which has started today .
the rmt union is in dispute with the companies over driver-only-operated trains , which it says would be unsafe and lead to widespread job losses .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: axed hospital cleaning firm 's shares dive
text: the infrastructure and construction firm , carillion , which had its cleaning contract with nottingham university hospitals axed earlier this year , has seen its shares drop 38 % .
it 's in the wake of a warning its annual results would be `` below management 's previous expectations '' .
the company said it would undertake a `` comprehensive review '' of the business .

as well as a stake in the project to build nottingham 's tram system , carillion 's projects have included the first phase of the battersea power station development and the extension of liverpool 's anfield football ground .
nuh trust ended its private cleaning contract with the firm after complaints of a rat in a city hospital ward kitchen .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: thief sneaks into home and steals car
text: a thief sneaked into a house in hathersage through an unlocked window and left with the owner 's car .
according to derbyshire police the person entered a home on crossland street between 22:30 on 6 july and 06:30 on 7 july .
they took a laptop , wallet and mobile phone before driving off in a black ford kuga titanium parked outside .
officers are asking anyone with any information to get in touch .
author: Liam Barnes
BBC News Online

documents.title: new a50 bridge : great news for houses and business
text: major construction work that closed the a50 in staffordshire over the weekend is on track according to staffordshire county council .
six steel beams , each weighing approximately 45 tonnes , were lifted into place by a 750 tonne crane as part of a new bridge over the carriageway at uttoxeter .
this is an important part of the growth strategy for staffordshire .
it does several things , it opens up the area to housing , safe access to the a54 commercial units .
the a50 is a major through route from east to west , from stoke through to derby .
it 's an important development . ''
the £ 5m work is due to finish in november next year .
a50 at uttoxeter is now reopen in both directions - seven hours ahead of schedule after weekend bridge building @ twitterid
author: John Acres
Journalist, BBC Radio Stoke

documents.title: atm ram raiders rip out front of building
text: this is the scene in ashby-de-la-zouch this morning after a cash machine was ripped out of the nationwide building society .
it looks as if the ram raiders have ripped out the entire shop front .
leicestershire police were called just after 03:00 this morning .
officers said it 's caused extensive damage to the building and a large amount of debris had to be cleared from the road .
the whole of market street is closed off to traffic but pedestrians can pass .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: can derby 's clarke go all the way at wimbledon ?
text: we 're halfway through the wimbledon fortnight , and derby 's jay clarke is still gunning for glory in the men 's doubles .

alongside partner marcus willis the 18-year-old defeated reigning champions pierre hugues-herbert and nicolas mahut on saturday , in what 's been described as one of the major upsets of this year 's tournament .
the pair are due to start their third round match later this morning .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: button battery burned hole in girl 's nose
text: a cautionary tale here .
when she was four , kelsie heath , from sileby , put a button battery like this one up her nose .
it was n't discovered for nearly five months , during which time it leaked acid and kelsie , now seven , has suffered damage to her ears and sinuses .
leicester royal infirmary says it treats one patient a week for injuries caused by button batteries , which are often found in children 's toys .
her mum , kerrie heath , said it 's affecting her daughter 's ability to gain weight and says she 's got a hole at the top of her nose the size of a 50p piece that will need reconstructive surgery .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: woman sexually assaulted in nottingham
text: do you recognise this man ?
police want to speak to him after a woman was sexually assaulted in nottingham in the early hours of saturday .
the 22-year-old was walking home from work and had got to waverley street at the junction with raleigh street , near the arboretum , just before 03:00 when the man assaulted her .
she managed to fight him off and run away .
he is described as dark skinned , about 5ft 8ins tall and in his late 20s .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: investigation into blaze at industrial site
text: fire investigators will return to clay cross this morning after this large fire at an industrial unit yesterday evening .
nobody was injured in the fire in a building on derby road behind cmc motorcycles .
at its height four crews were at the scene .
an investigation is now under way into how the fire started but it 's not thought to have been deliberate .
author: BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: mum of stabbed backpacker retraces daughter 's footsteps
text: it 's been almost a year since mia ayliffe-chung , from wirksworth in derbyshire , was stabbed to death in an australia hostel .
her mother travelled to sydney to follow in her daughter 's footsteps , even visiting the cubicle where she died .
french national , smail ayed , has been charged with her murder .
she 's campaigning to improve the conditions in which backpackers have to work in australia .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live
